name: VNDAC Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enables heavy industry to produce the mainline ships used by the Void Night Defense and Assault Corps

name: VNDAC Command Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enables heavy industry to produce the ships used by the command unit of the Void Night Defense and Assault Corps

name: VNDAC Recon Package
desc: A set of blueprints that enables heavy industry to produce the ships used by the the 514th Recon Division of the Void Night Defense and Assault Corps
